div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
An Implementation Guide covering the OpenMRS FHIR2 module implementation of FHIR

name.value: OpenMRS, Inc.

description.value: An Implementation Guide covering the OpenMRS FHIR2 module implementation of FHIR

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

name.value: OMRS Address

description.value: Address profile specifies the geological location details

name.value: OpenMRS condition

description.value: A FHIR Condition as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: Openmrs Encounter

description.value: A FHIR Encounter as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OMRS Group

description.value: A Group Resource is described as Cohort in Fhir2 OMRS

name.value: OpenMRS Immunization

description.value: A FHIR Immunization Resource as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OpenMRS Location

description.value: An OpenMRS location

name.value: OpenMRS Location Contact Point

description.value: An OpenMRS Location Phone Number

name.value: OMRS Medication

description.value: A FHIR Medication Resource as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OMRS Medication Dispense

description.value: Indicates that a medication product is to be or has been dispensed for a named person/patient. This includes a description of the medication product (supply) provided and the instructions for administering the medication. The medication dispense is the result of a pharmacy system responding to a medication order.

name.value: OpenMRS Medication Request

description.value: A FHIR MedicationRequest as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OpenMRS Patient

description.value: A FHIR Patient as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OpenMRS Patient Identifier

description.value: Patient Identifers as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OpenMRS Person

description.value: A FHIR Person as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: Openmrs Practitioner

description.value: A FHIR Practitioner as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OpenMRS AllergyIntolerance

description.value: A FHIR Allergy as understood by OpenMRS

name.value: OpenMRS Diagnostic Report

description.value: DiagnosticReport resource created by a OpenMRS that representing results of diagnostic tests that are performed in a given clinical context.

name.value: OpenMRS Observation

description.value: Observation resource created in OpenMRS representing a result for an order submitted by an EMR System

name.value: OpenMRS Service Request

description.value: Service Request Resource is represents a request for some type of procedure or diagnostic test to be performed. When fulfilled, the results of this request are represented as a DiagnosticReport resource with associated Observation resources

name.value: OpenMRS Task

description.value: A Task resource represent an activity that is to be performed,and track the completion of said activity between an OpenMRS and a FHIR2

name.value: Group descriptive extension

description.value: Extension for group description

name.value: OpenMRS Patient Identifier Location

description.value: OpenMRS location for which this identifier is valid
Encounter status ValueSet

name.value: Immunization Status ValueSet

description.value: Immunization Value Set

name.value: Location Status ValueSet

description.value: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

name.value: Medication Request Intent Vs

description.value: Medication Request Intent ValueSet

name.value: Medication Request Priority ValueSet

description.value: Openmrs Medication Request Priority ValueSet

name.value: OpenMRS Intent for Task

description.value: The intent of the task, subset from https://www.hl7.org/FHIR/valueset-task-intent.html

name.value: OpenMRS Status for Task

description.value: The state of the task, subset from https://www.hl7.org/FHIR/valueset-task-status.html

name.value: OpenMRS Diagnostic Report Status Flag

description.value: The status of the diagnostic report, subset from https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-diagnostic-report-status.html

name.value: OpenMRS Order Code

description.value: The code for the openmrs requested in the EMR.

name.value: Encounter Type Code System

description.value: Encounter Type Coding System

name.value: Medication Dispence Example

description.value: OMRS Medication Dispence Resource Example

name.value: Allergy Intolerance Resource Example

description.value: Example OMRS Allergy Intolerance

name.value: Encounter Resource Example

description.value: Example OMRS Encounter

name.value: Openmrs Person

description.value: Example OMRS Person Resource

name.value: Practitioner Example

description.value: Practitioner Resource Example

name.value: Openmrs DiagnosticReport

description.value: Example OMRS DiagnosticReport Resource

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the category

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the category eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?category={category}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the clinical-status

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the clinical-status eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?clinical-status={codeable concept}

name.value: Search in AllergyIntolerance endpoint basing on AllergyIntolerance uuid attribute

description.value: Searches based on the AllergyIntolerance uuid field for the AllergyIntolerance record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/AllergyIntolerance?_id={uuid}

name.value: Search in AllergyIntolerance endpoint basing on AllergyIntolerance lastUpdated attribute

description.value: Searches based on the AllergyIntolerance lastUpdated field for the AllergyIntolerance record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?_lastUpdated={date}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the manifestation

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the manifestation eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?manifestation={codeable concept}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by a given patient

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient={patientUuid}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by a given patient

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the patient's family name

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the patient's given name

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the patient's full or partial name

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.name={name}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by the severity

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the severity eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?category={codeable concept}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by subject uuid

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by subject family

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by subject given

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by subject identifier

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through AllergyIntolerance endpoint by subject name

description.value: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.name={name}

name.value: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner family

description.value: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner given

description.value: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.given={givenName}

description.value: Searches for observations by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by the patient's family name

description.value: Searches for observations based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by the patient's given name

description.value: Searches for observations based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by the patient's full or partial name

description.value: Searches for observations based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient.name={name}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by subject uuid

description.value: Searches for observations by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by subject family

description.value: Searches for observations based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by subject given

description.value: Searches for observations based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by subject identifier

description.value: Searches for observations by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through observation endpoint by subject name

description.value: Searches for observations based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient.name={name}

name.value: Searches for an observation whose value is a concept that matches the provided concept code

description.value: Searches for an observation whose value is a concept that matches the provided concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?value-concept={concept}

name.value: Searches for an observation whose value is a date by the specified date range.

description.value: Searches for an observation whose value is a date by the specified date range. eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?value-date={date}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location city

description.value: Searches based on the patient's recorded city/village of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-city={city}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location country

description.value: Searches based on the patient's recorded country of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-country={country}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location postal code

description.value: Searches based on the patient's recorded postal code of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-postalcode={postalCode}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location state

description.value: Searches based on the patient's recorded state/province of addresseg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-state={state}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's birthdate attribute

description.value: Searches based on the patient's birthdate eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?birthdate={date}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's death-date attribute

description.value: Searches based on the death date of the patient (if any) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?death-date={date}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint checking for those that passed on or still alive

description.value: Searches based on whether a patient is marked as deceased. Acceptable values are true or false eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?deceased={boolean}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's gender attribute

description.value: Searches based on the gender of the patient. Note that this value must be from the AdministrativeGender valueset eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?gender={gender}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's uuid

description.value: Searches based on the exact UUID of the patient record eg} /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?_id={uuid}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint basing on dateCreated or dateUpdated field of the patient record

description.value: Searches based on the the dateCreated or dateUpdated field for the patient record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?_lastUpdated={date-range}

name.value: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's full or partial name

description.value: Searches for patient based on patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?name={name}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's location city

description.value: Searches based on the person's recorded city/village of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?address-city={city}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's location country

description.value: Searches based on the person's recorded country of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?address-country={country}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's location postal code

description.value: Searches based on the person's recorded postal code of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?address-postalcode={postalCode}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's location state

description.value: Searches based on the person's recorded state/province of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?address-state={state}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's birthdate attribute

description.value: Searches based on the person's birthdate eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?birthdate={date}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's gender attribute

description.value: Searches based on the gender of the person. Note that this value must be from the AdministrativeGender valueset eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?gender={gender}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's uuid

description.value: Searches based on the exact UUID of the person record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?_id={uuid}

name.value: Search through person endpoint basing on dateCreated or dateUpdated field of the person record

description.value: Searches based on the the dateCreated or dateUpdated field for the person record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?_lastUpdated={date-range}

name.value: Search through person endpoint by the person's full or partial name

description.value: Searches for Person based on full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?name={name}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by concept code

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the serviceRequest concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?code={code}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by encounter uuid

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the serviceRequest encounter Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?encounter={uuid}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by service Uuid

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on service Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?_id={uuid}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by service lastUpdated field

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on service lastUpdated field eg) /openmrs/ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?_lastUpdated={date}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Occurrence when service should occurance

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on to occurrent date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?occurrence={date}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by patient uuid

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest by a given patient Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient={uuid}

name.value: Search serviceRequest endpoint by patient identifier id

description.value: Searches for ServiceRequest by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by the patient's family name

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by the patient's given name

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by the patient's full or partial name

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.name={name}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner uuid

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest by Practitioner uuid who requested the service eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner={uuid}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner family

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner given

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner identifier

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest by the Practitioner identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner name

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.name={name}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject uuid

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject family

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject given

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject identifier

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

name.value: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject name

description.value: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}
